case_circumstances: Found in wooded area. Mandible missing and most bones were recovered. Lower denture found nearby. Upper jaw edentulous. Fragments of a handwritten letter were also found and read "Dear Dad" and was signed with love form "Pam T Dwight" or "Pam + Dwight."
